title: Scientific Topic Research and Data Collection Strategies for Documentary Production

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational science knowledge and digital device utilization skills
context.additional_context: Environment requiring mastery of specialized research methods for science documentary production. Designed to systematically develop data collection skills for beginners through technology-enhanced online modules

learning_goals: Learners can select and apply three or more research methodologies for producing scientific-themed documentaries
Learners can explain scientific data collection procedures, including ethical considerations when gathering primary/secondary sources
Learners can process collected data into categorizable and analyzable formats using digital tools
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
